text: Charles Pasqua (18 April 1927 – 29 June 2015) was a French businessman and Gaullist politician. He was Interior Minister from 1986 to 1988, under Jacques Chirac's cohabitation government, and also from 1993 to 1995, under the government of Édouard Balladur. == References == Category:1927 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Government ministers of France Category:Politicians from Provence-Alpes-Cote d'Azur Category:People from Alpes-Maritimes
title: Charles Pasqua
